channel.title: BRAND NEW DISCOVERY artmoney
channel.description:
THIS IS NOT A SCAM, (there is no possible way to scam you by doing this, anyway) yes, i'm new, but ive been around the cheating communities for some time now. I dont post much, i just sponge up information. I came accross "Artmoney" a couple times on some forums, and heard "bla bla bla." "artmoney is client side only." "You can't keep the 10Million coins you make." Well, the coin thing is true, as far as i know.
but i made a groundbreaking discovery.
i'm not completely sure how i did this but...
I arrived in Varrok, and you know how when you bank after using artmoney (just opening the bank itself) makes the item go back to its original value? Well...
A steel longsword appeared in my inventory. Able to be banked, traded, equipped.
Breakthrough? I think so. I NEED a mod's help or someone that is good with programming, i WILL NOT post any more information here because i dont want this getting out. If no one helps me, I will continue on for months trying to exploit my discovery, and eventually will be f*cking rich. Go ahead, try to find out how alone, theres trillions of combinations in artmoney. Good luck.
If anyone finds out a way to exploit my findings, there is no way to prove i will get this knowledge. therefore i have to be extremely careful with who i tell this information to. i need YOUR word that we will work together on this, finally break runescape, and keep it within a small group so as not to ruin the RS economy altogether.
Imagine spawning 10's of P Hat sets...just imagine....THERE MUST BE A WAY
~Zero~

item.title: BRAND NEW DISCOVERY artmoney
item.dc:creator: @whothe0 the fu superior
item.description:
@whothe0 wrote:

if u truely made a breakthrough maybe there is a certain item u get when u make a certain item (like the steel long in ur case)

but i really doubt it ,maybe u forgot it in ur inventory

Read full topic

item.title: BRAND NEW DISCOVERY artmoney
item.dc:creator: @boberick boberick
item.description:
@boberick wrote:

hey i just saw you on youtube, well, your post teaching an artmoney noob. it was either you or the guy who always says artmonkey instead of artmoney.

Read full topic

item.title: BRAND NEW DISCOVERY artmoney
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

THERE MUST BE A WAY

Well, there musn’t be.
It’s possible that Jagex has left possible exploits in the code, but it isn’t necessary that they are abusable with artmoney. There are surely bugs but they may not be useful. If you think you have something you can always PM me; I don’t really care about Runescape wealth or fame among the community, and I will do my best to see if you have anything interesting on your hands.

Read full topic

item.title: BRAND NEW DISCOVERY artmoney
item.dc:creator: @boberick boberick
item.description:
@boberick wrote:

if he did actualy spawn a steel longsword it is a breakthrough, compared to the noobs saying “giv me your puser and pass and bank pin and credit card number and transaction id`s so i can hack you up infinity bilion goins!!\11\11\11”

but its probably just accedentaly took one out of your bank. or artmoney accidently got in the way of the packets encripted shitty stuf…
anyway sweet if you did actualy do it. 1 mo i can change the amount in the trade screen, look at the chat box though lol.

Read full topic
